body_html:
I am using the Dockerfile from here which checks out r0.8. I am also setting:

ENV TF_UNOFFICIAL_SETTING=1 \
    TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES=3.0

and passing to bazel:

--local_resources 3072,3.0,1.0
body_text:
I am using the Dockerfile from here which checks out r0.8. I am also setting:
ENV TF_UNOFFICIAL_SETTING=1 \
    TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES=3.0

and passing to bazel:
--local_resources 3072,3.0,1.0
body:
I am using the Dockerfile from [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/dcbc4701845b6bad57b6183514d64d0eeabad57a/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile.devel-gpu) which checks out `r0.8`. I am also setting:

```
ENV TF_UNOFFICIAL_SETTING=1 \
    TF_CUDA_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES=3.0
```

and passing to bazel:

```
--local_resources 3072,3.0,1.0
```
